level.text: 717.1 In addition to the requirements of Chapter 1 (General Provisions) of thect (D.C. Official Code § 29-101.01 et seq. (2011 Repl.)), a foreign entity ororeign limited liability partnership filing a statement of foreign registrationhall include in the statement:
The signature of the entity’s governor or other individual authorized to signn behalf of the governor; and
The signing individual’s name and capacity to sign.
